thread.title: Student designs genius aircraft; doesn't remember a thing
thread.title_full: Student designs genius aircraft; doesn't remember a thing

title: Student designs genius aircraft; doesn't remember a thing
text:
Student designs genius aircraft; doesn't remember a thing Last updated 13:39, September 9 2015 Keith Fraley/Twitter 
"So my roommate came back last night and doesn't remember designing an entire f airplane". 
A lot of students like to drink, but most of them don't manage to design an 'Ekranoplan' plane while doing it. 
That is unless you are a mechanical engineering student known as 'Mark', who upon returning back to his room one night, drew a complex design for a high speed aircraft that floats above water - while being so intoxicated he didn't realise he was, in fact, a genius. After drinking vodka, then spilling his creative juices all over a whiteboard, Mark fell asleep and woke up with absolutely no recollection of what he'd done. The whole hilarious episode was witnessed by Mark's college roommate Keith Fraley, who later posted a picture of the design to Twitter, with the caption; "So my roommate came back last night and doesn't remember designing an entire f*
